name: Sun Mask
description: The Sun mask is the protagonist during the Bwa dance ritual which celebrates the farming season in Burkina Faso. The project aims to bringing new life to ancient sacred mask with a modern 3D design and lighten treatment. An interaction of circular designs surrounded by triangular shapes want to symbolize the sunrays and rhythm of dance ritual. Sun mask is part of a series born from a collaboration between Matteo Cerri & Alberto Rossi.
